title: SoundCloud Issue: All Stars 2017 Music Theme

embed.description: Stream 2017 League of Legends All-Star Event Theme by LeagueofLegends from desktop or your mobile device

body:
On the official League of Legends Youtube video for this music theme, it states that the song is accessible on SoundCloud and that it was available for download.
However, since the release and many months after, the option has never been added.
Just letting you guys know, because a lot of people would've liked to download this magnificent piece of music!

Talked to a Rioter in Support and the response was:
Hey there, my name is Gunny,

Oh weird! We can't actually modify how things like this work through our Support Systems, but you could probably get some advice and traction on this by reporting it in our boards here:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art

Let me know if you need anything else!

Gunny
Riot Games Player Support

May all your hits be crits and all your fails be tales!

So here's that post! Hopefully this reaches someone who can fix this issue.

replies.body: Hi KR Zyrie, apologies for that (sometimes the DL option may accidentally be left unchecked) & thank you for bringing it up! I just updated the track on SoundCloud so you should be able to download the piece now :)

######Are you sure? Double check all the music bruh
Btw Ty for this free music.
